instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message:
Logic board had multiple componentes ( resistors, capacitor, etc) missing. Put them all and now it start, start to loading apple and reboot. 

Things i have alredy tried: 

 - It doesnt starts for diagnosis with D pressed (also CMD+D)
 -  Clean EFI had been installed with same result
 - Tried to boot in DFU mode to check if it is T2 problem but no way to boot it in DFU

I checked and all reails seems be ok.

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message:
Can be GPU issue.
Try first to boot in safe mode.

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message: already checked safe mode. no way

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message: Can you install Windows on it?

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message: didn't try that. if possible to insta,l windows what i can do?

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message:
Windows will not install many drivers.
Once installed (if possible) start to install drivers one by one; GPU first recommended.
You can note which driver installation crashes the machine...

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message: impossible. When i start with ALT mac freezes.

threads.title: 820-00928-a boot loop
threads.message:
Check if all needed components are soldered.
Be aware, some of them not needed; marked as NO STUFF.
Other component depend on the boatd version; TRUE/FALSE notes near them.
Hopeless project if someone else messed up with it before...
